channel.title: Lynette Howell Taylor on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Lynette Howell Taylor on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscars: Lynette Howell Taylor Elected President of Film Academy
item.description: The British Oscar-nominated producer of ‘A Star Is Born’ is the youngest person in 70 years and the first person born outside of the U.S. in 28 years to hold the position.

item.title: Oscars: Who Will Succeed Outgoing Film Academy President Janet Yang?
item.description: After three years as the Academy’s top officer, term limits are forcing Yang to vacate her role, and insiders say that fellow producer Lynette Howell Taylor, who currently serves as one of the organiz
